entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
